body_html:
I recently ran some benchmarks with Tensorflow grpc interface here and did not observe slowness.

Generally speaking, there can be many reasons for things to be slow. Waiting for a slow machine perhaps? I recommend simplifying your code to the minimum case that isolates the problem

Generally speaking, there can be many reasons for things to be slow. Waiting for a slow machine perhaps? I recommend simplifying your code to the minimum case that isolates the problem
body:
I recently ran some benchmarks with Tensorflow grpc interface  [here](https://github.com/diux-dev/cluster/tree/master/psbench) and did not observe slowness.

Generally speaking, there can be many reasons for things to be slow. Waiting for a slow machine perhaps? I recommend simplifying your code to the minimum case that isolates the problem
